articles.title: Texas becomes the first US state with more than 1 million Covid-19 infections
articles.description: Texas has now surpassed one million Covid-19 infections since the start of the pandemic, according to data from Johns Hopkins University -- becoming the first US state to record such a staggering number of cases.

articles.title: Will college students bring Covid-19 home for Thanksgiving?
articles.description: Infectious disease experts are urging college students taking classes in person to shelter in place — on campus. That said, if your child must come home, the return-home plan needs to be airtight, and the entire family has to take precautionary steps.
